import MDBox from"components/MDBox";import MDTypography from"components/MDTypography";import MDAvatar from"components/MDAvatar";// Images
import burceMars from"assets/images/bruce-mars.jpg";import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function Header(){const[visible,setVisible]=useState(true);const handleSetVisible=()=>setVisible(!visible);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Card,{id:"profile",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(MDBox,{p:2,children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Grid,{container:true,spacing:3,alignItems:"center",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Grid,{item:true,children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(MDAvatar,{src:burceMars,alt:"profile-image",size:"xl",shadow:"sm"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Grid,{item:true,children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(MDBox,{height:"100%",mt:0.5,lineHeight:1,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(MDTypography,{variant:"h5",fontWeight:"medium",children:"Alex Thompson"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(MDTypography,{variant:"button",color:"text",fontWeight:"medium",children:"CEO / Co-Founder"})]})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Grid,{item:true,xs:12,md:6,lg:3,sx:{ml:"auto"},children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(MDBox,{display:"flex",justifyContent:{md:"flex-end"},alignItems:"center",lineHeight:1,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(MDTypography,{variant:"caption",fontWeight:"regular",children:["Switch to ",visible?"invisible":"visible"]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(MDBox,{ml:1,children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Switch,{checked:visible,onChange:handleSetVisible})})]})})]})})});}export default Header;
